name: Avik Ventures
overview:
A former healthcare start up executive, Sharon Knight, founder of Avik Ventures, is an early stage company advisor and angel investor based in San Francisco. Her focus is on Healthcare and Consumer Products and Services companies. I plan to make 5-7 investments a year ranging from $10 - $50K each.

I am particularly interested in healthcare solutions that promote improved patient access, more personalized experiences, or better engagement, connectivity and participation with a goal towards improved health and wellness. I am actively exploring the intersection of gaming and healthcare for which I have a unique combination of experience.

If you are building a business that is disruptive or transformative, particularly one that has the potential to change the way we work or live, making us healthier, happier, more efficient or more productive, I would like to hear from you. My mission is to share my experience and connections to help entrepreneurs realize their dreams.
